Package com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.texture

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITexture
    Contains an IBitmap and the configuration for how it should be drawn.
    ITextureCoordinator
    Coordinates the texture bindings to texture units.
    ITextureCoordinator.ITextureCoordinatorFactory  
    ITextureDriver
    Provides access to low level GPU functionality for managing textures.
    ITextureManager
    Manages the loading of textures to the GPU.
    ITextureRegion
    Defines an area inside a texture.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTextureCoordinator  
    DefaultTextureCoordinator.BindingInfo  
    DefaultTextureCoordinator.TextureCoordinatorFactory  
    DefaultTextureManager  
    DefaultTextureManager.TextureInfo  
    Texture  
    TextureRegion
